mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT RESCH_PAT_ID patientId, 'xxxx' sampleId, '9999' age, 'xxxx' cancerStudies, 'xxxxx' cancerType, 'xxxx' cancerTypeDetails FROM CLSPNEXRT

SELECT DISTINCT 'Lab_test' subject, EXAM_CD id, IFNULL(EXAM_ENG_NM, EXAM_CD) name FROM CLSPNEXRT
WHERE LENGTH(EXAM_CD) < 6

SELECT 'Lab_test' subject, EXAM_SLIP_CD pid , EXAM_CD id, IFNULL(EXAM_ENG_NM, EXAM_CD) name, RCEP_DT time, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(EXAM_RSLT_VAL),0),2) exam, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(MARK_RSLT_VAL),0),2) mark, ROUND(IFNULL(SUM(CRTE_MSR_VAL),0),2) crte
FROM CLSPNEXRT /*WHERE RESCH_PAT_ID = '6905950076' AND EXAM_CD IN ('DA0036','BD0012','BA0094') AND SUBSTRING(RCEP_DT,1,4) = '2017' OR (EXAM_CD='BD0012' AND RCEP_DT='20040427')*/ WHERE RESCH_PAT_ID = '6905950076' /*AND EXAM_CD = 'AFIN'*/ /*AND EXAM_ENG_NM = 'Rh variant Ag,Automation (Semi-Qn)[Agglutination],Blood'*/ GROUP BY EXAM_SLIP_CD, EXAM_CD, EXAM_ENG_NM, RCEP_DT ORDER BY 2,3,5 LIMIT 10000

SELECT MTTN_EXAM_RSLT_ID , RESCH_PAT_ID, GENE_EXAM_SPCN_ID, EXAM_NO, GENE_EXAM_MTH_NM, CHRM_NO, GENE_NM, GENE_VARI_ST_LOC_VAL, GENE_VARI_END_LOC_VAL, DNA_STRND_VAL, GENE_VARI_CLSF_NM, GENE_VARI_TYP_NO, REF_ALLELE_SQNC_VAL, VARI_ALLELE_SQNC_VAL, MTTN_STAT_NO, HGVSC_VAL, HGVSP_VAL, TOT_ALLELE_READ_CNT, REF_ALLELE_READ_CNT, VARI_ALLELE_READ_CNT, VARI_ALLELE_READ_RT, EXON_LOC_VAL, INTRN_LOC_VAL, TRSC_ID FROM PMGERMUEM
